item.name: Lasagna
item.description: Layers and layers of fresh pasta, meat and homemade tomato sauce

item.name: Twisted House Salad
item.description: Spinach, romaine, almonds, sunflower seeds, cranberries, raisins, mandarin oranges, raspberry or poppy seed dressing

item.name: Italian All The Way Panini
item.description: Capicola, mortadella, salami, Hot sopressata, mozzarella, provolone cheese, hot peppers and Italian dressing

item.name: The Turkey & The Pig Wrap
item.description: Real turkey, bacon, lettuce, tomatoes, peppers, red peppers, mayo with spicy mustard

item.name: The Godfather Of Them All Veal Sandwich
item.description: Breaded and marinated veal topped with tomato sauce, peppers, onions and mushrooms on a fresh bun with melted provolone & mozzarella cheese
